Activity: Wake up and check email. Get motivated!
Addressing visual feedback from yesterday's playtesting session. Prioritize the most common complaints and begin implementing solutions.
Bug fixing and visual polish of the game world. Focus on addressing any remaining visual glitches or inconsistencies. Make sure the world feels polished and complete.
Continue working on marketing materials. Polish the screenshots from yesterday and start assembling footage for the trailer.
More optimization! Focus on optimizing any areas that are still causing performance problems. Push for a smooth and consistent frame rate throughout the game.
Review the trailer footage and refine the storyboard. Identify any gaps or weaknesses and plan for additional shots.
Create a cohesive and visually appealing game experience. Ensure that all the visual elements work together to create a unified and immersive world. The goal is a feast for the eyes!
Prepare a mid-week progress report and share it with the team. Get feedback and brainstorm solutions to any remaining challenges. Topic: Mid-Week Visual Progress Report
